column1: NOTE: x's are not to be changed (ignore), just change the positions indicated by letters/numbers/or ?
column4: Expedition FORScan - Updated 27. Dezember 2020
Action

Change ?? To: 2D=Raptor, 0E=F150, 0F=F250, 10=F350, 19=MKZ, 02=Focus, 03=Fusion, 04=C-Max, 06=Mustang,  08=Escape, 09=Edge, 24=Mondeo, 0B=Explorer, 20=Fiesta, 1B=MKC, 2E=Continental, 1C=MKX, 1E=Navigator, 0C=Expedition
Change ? To: 4-disable (off), 8-enable (on)

column1: Double Horn Honk (2015-2017) - Turns off the double honk you get when you exit your running vehicle with the keyfob with you
column4: Change ? To: 0-disable (off), 1-enable (on-default)

column1: Engine Hour Counter on Dash - Begins counting engine hours and engine idle time from moment this is activated
column4: Change ? To: 0-disable (off-default), C-enable (on)
Press and hold Left 'OK' button on Steering Wheel, Start Car, Continue holding Left 'OK' button until Engineer Data shows on Instrument Cluster

column1: Heated Steering Wheel Icon on Sync 3 Screen
column4: Change ? to: 4=HSW, 5=Heated Seats/HSW, 6=Heated/Cooled Seats/HSW, 7=Heated Seats/HSW,  C=AC/Rear/HSW, D=Heated/AC/Rear/HSW, E=Everything (NOTE: Recommend C, D, or E, depending on your vehicle's options)

column1: Heated Steering Wheel - On with Remote Start (Provides the option in the Left Instrument Cluster to enable the HSW to come on when you start Expy by Remote)
column4: Change ? To: Add 4 to the existing value at ?...example, mine had a 9, so + 4 = D, or if you have an A; change to E and so on

column1: Heated Steering Wheel Timeout - When HSW will deactivate
column4: Change ? To: 0-Disabled (Default-HSW stays on until you turn it off), 8-5 minutes, 9-10 minutes, A-12 minutes, B-15 minutes, C-18 minutes, D-20 minutes, E-25 minutes, F-30 minutes

column1: Heated Steering Wheel Temperature - Internal Temp of the Steering Wheel in Degrees Fahrenheit (NOTE: Higher Temps may shorten HSW heating element lifespan)
column4: Change ?'s to: 44 4444 = 68 (13-15 Fusion/MKZ default), 4C 4C4C = 76, 54 5454 = 84 (Mondeo Default),  58 5858 = 88, 5A 5A5A = 90, 5C 5C5C = 92 (16-18 Fusion/Explorer Default), 5E 5E5E = 94, 64 6464 = 100 (16-18 MKZ/MKC Default)
column5: 17LimitedExpy (NOTE: Since I installed the 2016 Explorer HSW, I changed this setting to 5C 5C5C…this gives me the default 16 Explorer heat setting of 92)

column1: Ignition -  -> Key in Ignition Chime Disable
column4: Change ? To: 0-disable (off), 8-enable (on-default)

column1: Lights - Bambi Mode (Fogs on with High Beams)
column4: Change ? To: 1-disable (off-default), 2-enable (on)

column1: Lights - Dark Car Mode (Police/Stealth) turns off your interior and puddle lights when you enter/exit/turn off your vehicle
column4: Change ? To: 1 = Enabled, 0 = Disabled

column1: Lights - Dash Fog Light Indicator Off
column4: Change ? To: 0-disable (off), 1-enable (on-default)
Change ? To: 4-disable (off), 6-enable (on-default)

column1: Lights - DRL Lock (on/off) Some Fleet trucks have the DRL locked to on…if you want to turn off your DRLs on these Fleet/Rental trucks, you must turn this setting to OFF
column4: Change ? To: 0-Off, 1-On

column1: Lights - DRL Option - Parking Lights (tail lights on also)
column4: Change ? To:  0=Disabled, 1=Enabled
Change ? To: 0-DRL Disable, 1-DRL 50% Low Beam, 2-DRL Fog Lights, 3-DRL Turn Signal

column1: Lights - DRL Options on Instrument Cluster
column4: Change ? To: 8-disabled (off-default), C-enabled (on) NOTE: still greyed out, but displays DRL option thru Advanced Settings--Vehicle--Lighting
Change ?'s to: 0 and 0-disable (off), 1 and 1-enable (on-default)
Change ?'s to: 0 and 0-disable (off), 1 and 1-enable (on-default)

column1: Navigation in Motion - Allows Navigation use while in gear (Note: you may lose Sirius Travel Link, Vehicle Health Report and 911 Assist)
column4: Change ? To: 5-disabled (off-default), 7-enable (on)
Enable
Enable
Enable
Enable
Enable
Change ? To: 0-both chimes/reminders OFF, 2-Driver OFF, 4-Passenger OFF
Change ???? To: value as calculated in the link to the right
Change ? To: A-Off, 2-20 minutes, 3-30 minutes, 4-40 minutes, 5-50 minutes, 6-60 minutes
Change to 8 to display User Suspension Settings on IPC
Change ? To: 0-disabled (off-default), 8-enabled (on-adds OFF, ROCK, POP, CLASSIC, VOICE options on Sony Systems)

column1: Sync 3 - Blue Themed GT Performance Screen (Change all 3 lines)
column3: 7D0-01-02 0xxx xxxx xxxx 7D0-02-01 xxxx xDxx xxxx 7D0-03-01 xxxx x4xxx xxxx
column4: Gives you a blue themed screen and a GT startup screen animation

column1: Sync 3 - Camera View Vehicle (PAM hardware missing to display)
column4: Change ? To: 1=sedan, 2=coupe/convertible, 3=truck, 4=SUV/CUV, 5=van, 6=hatchback

column1: Sync 3 - Climate soft buttons on screen
column4: Change ? to: 1=Heated Seats, 2=Heated/Cooled Seats, 3=Heated Seats/AC, 4=Heated Steering Wheel, 5=Heated Seats/Steering Wheel, 6=Heated/Cooled Seats/Heated Steering Wheel, 7=Heated Seats/HSW, 8=AC/Rear Controls, 9=Heated Seats/AC/Rear Controls, A=Heated/Cooled Seats/AC/Rear, B=9, C=AC/Rear/HSW, D=Heated/AC/Rear/HSW, E=Everything
Change both lines to get the Lincoln Brown Sync 3 Theme (you also get the 'Lincoln' Power Down Display, but startup screen is unaffected)

Change ? To change Rear Air options on Sync 3: 0/1-normal, 2-Auto displays but not work and no RR Temp control, 3-no Auto, 4-no Auto, 5-no Auto, 6-Auto no work and no RR Temp Control, 7-no Auto, 8-no Auto and no Front Temp control, 9-no Auto and no Front Temp control, A-no temps and no RR Temp control, B-no Auto and no Front Temp control, C=B, D=B, E-Auto not work and no RR Fan or Temp control, F-no Auto
Change ? to: 0-Original, 1&2-Standard, 3-Lincoln Black Label, 4-Lincoln Presidential, 5-Raptor, 6-Mustang, 7-GT350 grey, 8-Vignale, 9-GT350 red, A-Ford, B-ST, C-RS, D-GT, E-Continental, F-Ford

column1: Sync 3 - Volume Indicator on Sync Screen (round or square)
column4: Change ? To: 0-Round (default), 1-Square
Change ? To: 0-disable (off-default), 1-enable (on) Note: Traffic alerts via FM Signal--US vehicles have this off since Sirius Travel Link is enabled

column1: Trailer Brake Controller - Activate (if installing a factory brake controller)
column4: Change to 8 to Activate factory brake controller

column1: Trailer Brake Controller - Gain Activate (if installing a factory brake controller)
column4: Change to 4 to Activate Gain display in IPC
Change ? to: 0-3 1 Flash, 4-5 2 Flashes, 6-7 3 Flashes, 8-9 4 Flashes, A-B 5 Flashes, C-D 6 Flashes, E-F 7 Flashes
First 5 of VIN (convert every 2 digits into HEX to get 1 digit of VIN) Note: Last 2 digits are FORScan checksum
Digit 6 of VIN (convert the 2 digits into HEX to get digit 6 of VIN) Note: Last 2 digits are FORScan checksum
Digits 7 thru 11 of VIN (convert every 2 digits into HEX to get digits 7-11 of VIN) Note: Last 2 digits are FORScan checksum
Digit 12 of VIN (convert the 2 digits into HEX to get digit 12 of VIN) Note: Last 2 digits are FORScan checksum
Last 5 of VIN (convert every 2 digits into HEX to get 1 digit of VIN) Note: Last 2 digits are FORScan checksum
